vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.52;
son of: Shobal (H7732H);
father of: Jahath (H3189); also called Reaiah at 1Ch.4.2;
Also named: re.a.yah (רְאָיָה "Reaiah" H7211I)
§ Haroeh = "vision"
a man of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Caleb; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈羅以 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "異象"
一個猶太人 #代上 2:52|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈罗以 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "异象"
一个犹太人 #代上 2:52|
